title: Did Bloomberg pay fines for 31,000 elephants from Florida so they could vote?
subtitle: Under the Florida Act, certain convicted offenders may be reinstated in their voting rights if they meet all the conditions - including monetary requirements - of the court ' s judgement.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The billionaire and former presidential candidate Michael Bloomberg raised more than $16 million to pay fines and return convicted criminals in Florida so that they could register to vote before the 2020 general election.
